meanings.definition: A type of head covering worn by women, typically consisting of a wide band of fabric gathered at the back of the head
meanings.sent1: She wore elegant snoods to keep her hair in place.
meanings.sent2: The snoods matched her outfits perfectly.
meanings.sent3: Her collection of snoods was the envy of her friends.
meanings.sent4: The snoods were like colorful crowns on their heads.
meanings.sent5: The soft snoods felt comfortable against her skin.

meanings.definition: A net or fabric bag worn at the back of a woman's head to hold the hair
meanings.sent1: The delicate snoods kept her hair neatly tucked away.
meanings.sent2: She secured her hair with a snood before going out.
meanings.sent3: Her snood was so big, it could fit all her hair inside.
meanings.sent4: The snood was like a gentle hug around her hair.
meanings.sent5: The snood's color complemented her hair beautifully.

meanings.definition: A decorative hairnet or fabric bag worn at the back of the head to hold the hair in place
meanings.sent1: The intricate snoods added a touch of elegance to her look.
meanings.sent2: She chose a sparkly snood for the special occasion.
meanings.sent3: Her snood had tiny pearls sewn into the fabric.
meanings.sent4: The snood shimmered under the lights like a jewel.
meanings.sent5: The snood's design was as lovely as a flower in bloom.
